title: O5-10 (The Archivist)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player at night. You will receive a list of all their targets from previous nights and the current night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you can correctly guess your target's role, then you will also receive a list of all the results they have received previously, not including the current night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the recontainment of all anomalies and elimination of all opposing forces.

desc:
Post 4539
*"Consider carefully, Ten," One said. "If the consequences for this project are dire as we fearâ€¦ if the Foundation comes crashing on our heads, it will come crashing on your head first."*
